### Build from Source

Note that you must have [Go](https://golang.org/doc/install) installed (latest is usually best).

    git clone https://github.com/lrstanley/YOUR_PROJECT_NAME.git && cd YOUR_PROJECT_NAME
    make
    ./YOUR_PROJECT_NAME --help
